events.message: I recently received my order, but I want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations and I am not satisfied.
The system has identified the case as a refund request based on the customer's mention of wanting their money back.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle this refund request for the order placed.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to request a refund. I'm here to assist you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the refund so I can start processing your request?
My order number is 123456789. I want a refund because the product did not work as advertised and was quite disappointing.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process. You should see the amount credited to your payment method within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and help. I appreciate you processing my refund promptly.
The refund request has been completed and the case is now resolved. Please contact us if you have any further questions.
We wanted to follow up to ensure you have received your refund and are satisfied with how your issue was handled. Please let us know.
Closing this case as the refund has been processed and the customer confirmed the resolution. Thank you for reaching out to us.
We have sent you a brief satisfaction survey to help us improve our service. We appreciate your feedback.
